SYNOPSIS
========

    Change password.

DESCRIPTION
===========

    We changed your password successfully.

WARNING
=======

    If you didn't perform this action, report to us. May be your account are
    under attacking.

METADATA
========

    Account             : $acc_name
    Remote              : $remote_addr
    Date                : $datetime_now

AUTHOR
======

    $root_name <root_email>
    $app_name
